titleInfo.title: Moral foundations and perceptions of rape in Colombia: Dataset Study 2

mods.abstract: This file contains the data of Study 2 reported in the paper "Moral Foundations and Perceptions of Rape in Colombia" by Laura Saldarriaga, Antonio Olivera-La Rosa, and Gerd Bohner

Bielefeld University.
